html:
Due to its unique flavor and high content of vitamin C, the Tahuampa company has been producing "camu camu liqueur with Amazon bark." This innovative drink, which has been well accepted by the Loreto public, has been developed with the support of CITEproductivo Maynas of the Technological Institute of Production (ITP) CITE network, a body attached to the Ministry of Production (Produce).

Through laboratory tests and technical assistance from CITE, this product now has a sanitary registration and high quality standards. ?In the CITEproductivo they gave me the guidelines to send the result of the product to their modern laboratories, the sanitary registry is an additional plus,? said Juan Manuel Hilasaca of the Tahuampa company.

?Camu camu is also good for cholesterol, it has a lot of calcium. Today people are in need of this fruit and apart from the bark it strengthens people?, concluded the businessman. Through the services provided by CITEproductivo, entrepreneurs can produce quality products through state-of-the-art technology, which is found in its modern fishing and agro-industrial processing plants.

As recalled, CITEproductivo Maynas aims to promote technology transfer actions, training and technical assistance in business units dedicated to tropical fruits and local fisheries, through specialized advice. The purpose is to increase its competitiveness by optimizing processes, capacity for innovation and development of improved products.
